name: City Traffic: Rider Highway Bi
description:
City Traffic: Rider Highway Bike is super-fast-paced highway traffic rider3d game with stunning graphics and smooth driving controls. Drive on endless city roads of highways in the rush hour time, motorcycle racer, be professional, and avoid any crashes with other vehicles because roads are full of speedy cars. Explore the beautiful cities & enjoy the real driving experience, & complete a challenging task!
Features:

• Lots of Moto Bikes to Choose
• Stunning 3D graphics
• Endless City Highways Road
• Easy Motorcycle Riding Controls
• Realistic Sound Effects
• Multiple Missions to Enjoy for motorcycle racer
